circumstances: Stewart Hammond was last seen leaving a local pharmacy at 31 Step Row, Dundee. His son reported him missing when he failed to return home later that evening. Concerns grew due to Stewart's propensity to wander into deserted areas and his known interest in local abandoned buildings. It is believed he may have headed towards Discovery Quay, which has a few old structures nearby. Search efforts also covered snow areas around 12 South Esk Road, Forfar. There was speculation about a possible boating incident as some of Stewart's belongings were later found near a derelict boat moored close to Discovery Quay. Police eventually located him there, mildly disoriented but unharmed.
